item.title: Host your website with AWS Amplify
item.description: Hello, This is the first project post of my blog. On this post we are going to use AWS Amplify to host our website on AWS. AWS Amplify is simplified Cloudfront + S3 website hosting on AWS. With less issues we can host our static websites on AWS.
